title: Ideally Situated In The Popular Schools Area - LIP 103
details: LIP-103 A perfect, slightly elevated 10 perch property, situated in Madawalamulla North and is just 150 meters off Wakwella road. This property is very well located and is surrounded by many good schools in the area. It could accommodate a small home for a family whom are looking to be situated close to the many good schools in the area including the popular Sussex and Richmond colleges. There is also the possibility of purchasing the adjacent 10 perch property to make it a 20 perch property.
